title: Certificates; revocation
context: §302A-602.5 Certificates; revocation. The department may revoke any certificate after its issuance if the certificate holder does not possess the requisite qualifications. For the purposes of this section, the term &ldquo;certificate&rdquo; does not include a license issued by the Hawaii teacher standards board pursuant to part III, subpart D. [L 1996, c 122, §§1, 7; am L 1999, c 218, §4; am L 2001, c 312, §§5, 11; am L 2002, c 193, §2]
